name: Enable encryption at rest using AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for Amazon FSx for Lustre file systems
description: Ensure that all Amazon FSx for Lustre file systems are encrypted at rest using a Customer Managed Key (CMK) from AWS Key Management Service (KMS). This provides an additional layer of data protection and control over the encryption keys.

name: Enable encryption at rest using AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP file systems
description: Ensure that all Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP file systems are encrypted at rest using a Customer Managed Key (CMK) from AWS Key Management Service (KMS). This provides an additional layer of data protection and control over the encryption keys.

name: Enable encryption at rest using AWS KMS Customer Managed Key (CMK) for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems
description: Ensure that all Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems are encrypted at rest using a Customer Managed Key (CMK) from AWS Key Management Service (KMS). This provides an additional layer of data protection and control over the encryption keys.

name: Enable tag copying to backups for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Configure Amazon FSx file systems to automatically copy tags to their backups. This ensures consistent tagging across file systems and their backups, facilitating better resource management and cost allocation.

name: Enable tag copying to volumes for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Configure Amazon FSx file systems to automatically copy tags to their volumes. This ensures consistent tagging across file systems and their volumes, facilitating better resource management and cost allocation.

name: Implement least privilege access for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Ensure that IAM policies and file system policies follow the principle of least privilege, granting only the necessary permissions to authorized entities for accessing and managing Amazon FSx file systems.

name: Enable automatic backups for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Configure automatic daily backups for all Amazon FSx file systems to ensure data recoverability and protection against accidental deletion or corruption.

name: Implement secure network configuration for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Ensure that Amazon FSx file systems are deployed in private subnets within a VPC, with appropriate security group rules to restrict access to only necessary sources and protocols.

name: Enable encryption in transit for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
description: Enforce the use of encryption in transit for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server by enabling SMB encryption, which secures data as it travels between the file system and clients.

name: Configure access control for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
description: Implement proper access control for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server using Active Directory integration and file-level permissions to ensure only authorized users and groups can access the file system resources.

name: Enable data deduplication for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
description: Enable data deduplication on Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems to optimize storage usage and potentially reduce the attack surface by minimizing redundant data storage.

name: Configure monitoring and alerting for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Set up Amazon CloudWatch alarms and metrics to monitor the performance, health, and security of Amazon FSx file systems, including alerts for suspicious activities or potential security incidents.

name: Implement regular patching for Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
description: Ensure that Amazon FSx for Windows File Server file systems are regularly patched with the latest security updates by enabling automatic patching or implementing a process for regular manual patching.

name: Enable storage capacity monitoring for Amazon FSx file systems
description: Configure storage capacity monitoring and alerting for Amazon FSx file systems to prevent potential disruptions due to insufficient storage and to maintain optimal performance.

name: Implement secure data transfer for Amazon FSx for Lustre
description: When transferring data between Amazon S3 and Amazon FSx for Lustre, ensure that the S3 bucket is properly secured and that the IAM role used for data transfer has the minimum necessary permissions.
